alert.note: Alert for Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Shackelford and southeastern Throckmorton Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 420 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Griffin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodson, Fort Griffin, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us- 283, The Intersection Of Us-283 And Ranch Road 209 and Lusk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Texas.
